aprel 07 wanida mrni/chi/eech/jdhmba/12 yana ankaya sahithawa kolonnawa pradeshiya sambandhikarana kamituwe sama sabhapathi parlimenthu manthri es.em. marikkar ha prasanga solangaaarachchi, kolambaa disthrik lekam, niwasa sanwardhana adhikariye sabhapathi, nagarika sanwardhana adhikariye sabhapathi, kolonnawa nagara sabhawe lekam, wallampitiya polis sthanadhipathi, dahampura grama niladhari wethada ema lipiyehi pitapath yawa atha.kolonnawa pradeshiya lekamwaraya wisin itha kadinamin mithotamulla kunu kanda awata padinchi ayage depala ha jiwitha surakshitha kirimata awashya idiri piyawara ganimata itha kadinamin pariksha kara bala warthawak labadena lesata jathika godanangili paryeshana sanwidhanaye adhyaksha janaralwarayagen likhithawa illimakda kara atha.
